mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id AS cardId, c.card_name AS cardName, c.benefit_limit AS benefitDescription FROM user_card uc JOIN card_product c ON uc.product_id = c.product_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT i.product_id AS productId, i.product_name AS insuranceName, i.coverage_type AS coverage FROM user_insurance ui JOIN insurance_product i ON ui.product_id = i.product_id WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT s.product_id AS productId, s.product_name AS productName, s.base_rate AS interestRate FROM user_savings us JOIN savings_product s ON us.product_id = s.product_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId}
